definitions: Took on or assumed (an idea, plan, or attitude).
Legally took another's child and brought it up as one's own.
Chose to take up, follow, or use (a new method, course of action, or habit).
Took and used (a name or title) for oneself.
Selected (a candidate or resolution) as one's own.
examples: The couple adopted a baby girl.
He adopted a pseudonym for his writing.
